title: NFL Draft Round 2 Reaction (Ep. 104)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Mike Lombardi review the second round of the NFL draft, including Carolina's draft habits (2:09), the Colts' offseason moves to stabilize their defense (6:45), what Cam Robinson will bring to Jacksonville (8:21), and Arizona's impressive selections (14:11). Then they analyze the Bengals' pick of Joe Mixon (20:50).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
